title: Boxes For Words in Game Chat
body: So i have been having a problem with my in game chat where all of my letters are boxes instead. it affects my store as well i cnt search for items because all i can input are boxes. I can however type in champion select before the game starts. usually when i get chat boxes it goes away after a few games but now i am stuck with them it seems. i have also gone through my keyboard settings and there isnt anything that lets me update the settings {{champion:103}}

replies.body: Did you make any modifications to your language or region settings in the past or did this just show up out of nowhere?
I have not made any changes lately it just shows up out of nowhere ususally its just every once in a while that it happens but as of late its just been like that every game

I'd recommend cleanly reinstalling League using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to ensure any corruptions or modifications aren't causing your issue.

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=AcidicDemon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RuAAN8xM,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-12-05T22:22:37.293+0000)
>
> I have not made any changes lately it just shows up out of nowhere ususally its just every once in a while that it happens but as of late its just been like that every game

Try re-installing.
